item.title: Front end developer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We need a front end colleague to be fluent in HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT and develop advanced web interfaces. He / She must be flexible, responsible, and enjoy teamwork.

item.title: Back end developer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We're looking for a passionate man. Curious about the domain and stubborn to be the best. You will work on the agency's projects and will transform your customers' needs into code lines, platforms, and applications. You will be up to date with new technologies and you will find new approaches to classical issues. Even if you sometimes give 404, we'll support you and find the right solution.

item.title: Copywriter
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We're looking for a storyteller. Always with your words, always with your jokes. Digital native and with minimal written experience, you will help your clients communicate their message in a more coherent, natural and elegant way.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Our services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541546704203{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538802692{margin-top: 65px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="01." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1541537503286{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Branding" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539988915763{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539988706097{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Branding has been around since 350 A.D and is derived from the word “Brandr”, meaning “to burn” in Ancient Norse language. By the 1500s, it had come to mean the mark that ranchers burned on cattle to signify ownership.

Yet branding today is more than just a look or a logo. It has come to signify the emotional “gut feeling” reaction a company can elicit from its customers.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="branding" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-branding.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538906962{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="design" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-design.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="02." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1541537510472{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Web Design" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539989149756{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539989111444{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design, interface design, authoring, including standardised code.

Web design partially overlaps web engineering in the broader scope of web development. Web designers are expected to have an awareness of usability and if their role involves.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538911605{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="03." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1541537518571{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Copywriting" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539989146060{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539989131846{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Copywriting is the act of writing text for the purpose of advertising or other forms of marketing. The product, called copy, is written content that aims to increase brand awareness and ultimately persuade a person or group to take a particular action.

Copywriters help create billboards, brochures, catalogs, jingle lyrics, magazine and newspaper advertisements, sales letters and other direct mail, scripts for television.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="copywriting" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-copywriting.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538916967{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="socialmedia" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-social-media.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="04." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1541537528487{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Social Media" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539728931621{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539989258236{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

A Facebook page on a smartphone screen Social media are interactive computer-mediated technologies that facilitate the creation and sharing of information, ideas, career interests and other forms of expression via virtual communities and networks.

Social media can help to improve an individual’s sense of connectedness with real or online communities, and can be an effective communication.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538925448{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="05." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1541537535212{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Print and Digital Design" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539989359834{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539989354160{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Digital Design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving through the use of typography, photography and illustration. The field is conside#6022ea a subset of visual communication and communication design.

Common uses of graphic design include corporate design, editorial design, wayfinding or environmental design, advertising, web design, communication design.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="digitaldesign" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-digital-design.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538931204{margin-top: 75px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="artdirection" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-art-direction.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="06." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1541537541595{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Art Direction" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539729037589{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="none" css=".vc_custom_1539989481587{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Art director is the title for a variety of similar job functions in theater, advertising, marketing, publishing, fashion, film and television, the Internet, and video games.

It is the charge of a sole art director to supervise and unify the vision. In particular, the art director is in charge of the overall visual appearance and how it communicates visually, contrasts features. The art director makes decisions about visual elements used.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="none"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1541546665564{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;background-color: #6022ea !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1538908117168{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Find The Best Solution for your Business." font_container="tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:24px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1538933290882{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Yet branding today is more than just a look or a logo. It has come to signify the emotional “gut feeling” reaction a company can elicit from its customers.

Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design, interface design, authoring, including standardised code.

Web design partially overlaps web engineering in the broader scope of web development. Web designers are expected to have an awareness of usability and if their role involves.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538911605{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="03." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130458788{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Copywriting" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130467329{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130474992{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Copywriting is the act of writing text for the purpose of advertising or other forms of marketing. The product, called copy, is written content that aims to increase brand awareness and ultimately persuade a person or group to take a particular action.

Copywriters help create billboards, brochures, catalogs, jingle lyrics, magazine and newspaper advertisements, sales letters and other direct mail, scripts for television.

Social media can help to improve an individual’s sense of connectedness with real or online communities, and can be an effective communication.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538925448{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="05." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130600615{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Print and Digital Design" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130612635{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130620312{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Digital Design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving through the use of typography, photography and illustration. The field is conside#6022ea a subset of visual communication and communication design.

Common uses of graphic design include corporate design, editorial design, wayfinding or environmental design, advertising, web design, communication design.

Customize your site in real-time and see the results instantly." title_color="dark_title" subtitle_color="dark_subtitle" description_color="dark_description" align_title="text-center" animation="fadeInUp"][vc_empty_space height="50px"][portfolio_filters number="-1" animation="fadeInUp" searchfilter="search_on" categoriesfilter="categories_on"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541539163635{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column][heading_title_subtitle title="What we do" subtitle="Our Services" description="No coding skills required to create unique sites. Customize your site in real-time and see the results instantly." title_color="dark_title" subtitle_color="dark_subtitle" description_color="dark_description" align_title="text-center" animation="fadeInUp"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538802692{margin-top: 65px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="01." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130364502{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Branding" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130374441{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130384302{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Branding has been around since 350 A.D and is derived from the word “Brandr”, meaning “to burn” in Ancient Norse language. By the 1500s, it had come to mean the mark that ranchers burned on cattle to signify ownership.

Yet branding today is more than just a look or a logo. It has come to signify the emotional “gut feeling” reaction a company can elicit from its customers.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="branding" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-branding.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538906962{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="design" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-design.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="02." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130426538{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Web Design" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130435152{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130441657{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design, interface design, authoring, including standardised code.

Web design partially overlaps web engineering in the broader scope of web development. Web designers are expected to have an awareness of usability and if their role involves.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538911605{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="03." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130458788{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Copywriting" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130467329{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130474992{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Copywriting is the act of writing text for the purpose of advertising or other forms of marketing. The product, called copy, is written content that aims to increase brand awareness and ultimately persuade a person or group to take a particular action.

Copywriters help create billboards, brochures, catalogs, jingle lyrics, magazine and newspaper advertisements, sales letters and other direct mail, scripts for television.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="copywriting" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-copywriting.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538916967{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="socialmedia" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-social-media.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="04." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130567397{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Social Media" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130576384{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130585326{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

A Facebook page on a smartphone screen Social media are interactive computer-mediated technologies that facilitate the creation and sharing of information, ideas, career interests and other forms of expression via virtual communities and networks.

Social media can help to improve an individual’s sense of connectedness with real or online communities, and can be an effective communication.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538925448{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="05." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130600615{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Print and Digital Design" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130612635{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130620312{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Digital Design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving through the use of typography, photography and illustration. The field is conside#6022ea a subset of visual communication and communication design.

Common uses of graphic design include corporate design, editorial design, wayfinding or environmental design, advertising, web design, communication design.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="digitaldesign" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-digital-design.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538931204{margin-top: 75px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="artdirection" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-art-direction.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="06." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130643686{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Art Direction" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130655562{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130662170{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Art director is the title for a variety of similar job functions in theater, advertising, marketing, publishing, fashion, film and television, the Internet, and video games.

It is the charge of a sole art director to supervise and unify the vision. In particular, the art director is in charge of the overall visual appearance and how it communicates visually, contrasts features. The art director makes decisions about visual elements used.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1541288290059{padding-top: 55px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}"][vc_column][heading_title_subtitle title="Professionals" subtitle="Dream Team" description="No coding skills required to create unique sites. Customize your site in real-time and see the results instantly." title_color="dark_title" subtitle_color="dark_subtitle" description_color="light_description" align_title="text-center" animation="fadeInUp"][vc_empty_space height="55px"][st_members_slider number="4" order="asc" animation="fadeInUp"][vc_empty_space height="30px"][st_members_slider number="4" order="desc" animation="fadeInUp"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1541539222800{padding-top: 55px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][heading_title_subtitle title="Professionals" subtitle="We Build Awesome Websites" title_color="dark_title" subtitle_color="dark_subtitle" description_color="light_description" align_title="text-left" animation="fadeInUp"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130717627{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

Whether you need a new logo, website, video, marketing campaign, or eBook created for your business, the key to making the project a success starts with having well-thought-out creative brief.

Customize your site in real-time and see the results instantly." title_color="dark_title" subtitle_color="dark_subtitle" description_color="dark_description" align_title="text-center" animation="fadeInUp"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538802692{margin-top: 65px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="01." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130364502{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Branding" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130374441{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130384302{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Branding has been around since 350 A.D and is derived from the word “Brandr”, meaning “to burn” in Ancient Norse language. By the 1500s, it had come to mean the mark that ranchers burned on cattle to signify ownership.

Yet branding today is more than just a look or a logo. It has come to signify the emotional “gut feeling” reaction a company can elicit from its customers.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="branding" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-branding.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538906962{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="design" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-design.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="02." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130426538{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Web Design" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130435152{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130441657{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design, interface design, authoring, including standardised code.

Web design partially overlaps web engineering in the broader scope of web development. Web designers are expected to have an awareness of usability and if their role involves.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538911605{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="03." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130458788{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Copywriting" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130467329{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130474992{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Copywriting is the act of writing text for the purpose of advertising or other forms of marketing. The product, called copy, is written content that aims to increase brand awareness and ultimately persuade a person or group to take a particular action.

Copywriters help create billboards, brochures, catalogs, jingle lyrics, magazine and newspaper advertisements, sales letters and other direct mail, scripts for television.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="copywriting" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-copywriting.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538916967{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="socialmedia" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-social-media.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="04." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130567397{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Social Media" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130576384{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130585326{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

A Facebook page on a smartphone screen Social media are interactive computer-mediated technologies that facilitate the creation and sharing of information, ideas, career interests and other forms of expression via virtual communities and networks.

Social media can help to improve an individual’s sense of connectedness with real or online communities, and can be an effective communication.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538925448{margin-top: 75px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="05." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130600615{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Print and Digital Design" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130612635{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130620312{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Digital Design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving through the use of typography, photography and illustration. The field is conside#6022ea a subset of visual communication and communication design.

Common uses of graphic design include corporate design, editorial design, wayfinding or environmental design, advertising, web design, communication design.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="digitaldesign" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-digital-design.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541538931204{margin-top: 75px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_hidden-xs"][st_vivus_animation icon_name="artdirection" icon_url="https://niva.lucianionut.com/wp-content/plugins/sweetthemes-framework/inc/shortcodes/st-vivus-animation/icons/st-art-direction.svg"][vc_column_text el_class="rotation"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="06." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:50px|text_align:left|color:%236022ea|line_height:50px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130643686{margin-top: 3px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Art Direction" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130655562{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1542130662170{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}"]

Art director is the title for a variety of similar job functions in theater, advertising, marketing, publishing, fashion, film and television, the Internet, and video games.

It is the charge of a sole art director to supervise and unify the vision. In particular, the art director is in charge of the overall visual appearance and how it communicates visually, contrasts features. The art director makes decisions about visual elements used.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

item.title: Tech designer John Doe's latest design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design; interface design; authoring, including standardised code.

Branding has been around since 350 A.D and is derived from the word “Brandr”, meaning “to burn” in Ancient Norse language. By the 1500s, it had come to mean the mark that ranchers burned on cattle to signify ownership. Yet branding today is more than just a look or a logo. It has come to signify the emotional “gut feeling” reaction a company can elicit from its customers.

The term web design is normally used to describe the design process relating to the front-end (client side) design of a website including writing mark up. Web design partially overlaps web engineering.
Michael Smith
Web design partially overlaps web engineering in the broader scope of web development. Web designers are expected to have an awareness of usability and if their role involves creating mark up then they are also expected to be up to date with web accessibility guidelines. Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design; interface design; authoring, including standardised code and proprietary software.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It’s the perfect solution for our business. Niva is the most valuable business resource we have EVER purchased. We’ve seen amazing results already.
It a very nice theme for our website

item.title: Art Direction
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Art director is the title for a variety of similar job functions in theater, advertising, marketing, publishing, fashion, film and television, the Internet, and video games.

item.title: Digital Design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Digital Design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving through the use of typography, photography and illustration. The field is conside#6022ea a subset of visual communication and communication design.

item.title: Social Media
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: A Facebook page on a smartphone screen Social media are interactive computer-mediated technologies that facilitate the creation and sharing of information, ideas, career interests and other forms of expression via virtual communities and networks.

item.title: Copywriting
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Copywriting is the act of writing text for the purpose of advertising or other forms of marketing. The product, called copy, is written content that aims to increase brand awareness and ultimately persuade a person or group to take a particular action.

item.title: Web Design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Web design encompasses many different skills and disciplines in the production and maintenance of websites. The different areas of web design include web graphic design, interface design, authoring, including standardised code.

item.title: Branding
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Branding has been around since 350 A.D and is derived from the word “Brandr”, meaning “to burn” in Ancient Norse language. Yet branding today is more than just a look or a logo. It has come to signify the emotional “gut feeling” reaction a company.
